p: On the last day of the experiment, hens were sacrificed by decapitation and their duodenum, jejunum, ileum, liver and cecal contents were collected. Moreover, small intestinal tissues and the cecal content of 30 hens (10 per group) whose egg production rate was close to the average value were used for further analysis. Experiments were conducted with the approval of the Kagawa University Animal Experiment Committee (Permission number: 2018-18648).
